about_the_game:
Fly, drone, liberate


Do you want a fast-paced action game combined with rogue-like and satire? We got you. If you like cartoonish violence, dark humor with arcade action using a drone – our game may tick all the right boxes.



What’s going on

Events take place in a free-spirited solarpunk country of Braveland, populated by anthropomorphic cats – Whiskers.

The country is invaded by pig-like Zorks from the Zorkian Federation. Under the influence of propaganda and envy, Zorks attack their furry neighbors with the goal of their complete elimination.

What you’ll get

  • Flashy cartoon action: Dive into combat using different weapons, buffs, abilities and drone upgrades.
  • Easy controls: Responsive controls to make the gameplay fluent and accessible.
  • Narrative quests: Explore the mini-quests based around the sociopolitical context. Help the residents, discover the life in Zork occupation, and its consequences.
  • Satirical approach: Allusion and caricature help to talk about serious and painful topics.
  • Procedurally generated locations and situations: Adapt and learn every run. Find enemies in comedic procedurally generated situations.

In the end, DRONE ‘EM ALL is a game for players who are into exploration with some action, enjoy rogue-likes, dark humor, and caricature violence.

If that’s who you are, be sure to wishlist.

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: DRONE ‘EM ALL is a cartoonish arcade rogue-like with a pinch of satire. Fly your drone, kill nasty Zorks, and free the invaded country of Braveland. Upgrade drones, eliminate mini-bosses, and explore the dramatic stories of residents.
